result.execSummary:
The defendant Violet Antoinette Blackdeer was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500) [Modifiers: Penalty - Retail Theft (<=$500)], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
Defendant's bond shall remain in effect during said Diversion Agreement.

Defendant shall file monthly written reports with the Monroe County Justice Department certifying the defendant's compliance with the conditions specified in the agreement.

The defendant shall provide any change of address information to the Monroe County Justice Department and Monroe County Clerk of Circuit Court within 24 hours of said change.

Defendant will pay a $20.00 per month Diversion Agreement fee to the Justice Program Coordinator or designee by the 5th day of each month.

Defendant shall meet in person with the Justice Program Coordinator or designee approximately every three (3) months while the Diversion Agreement is in effect.

Defendant shall appear in court at a review hearing approximately four (4) months after the Court's approval of the agreement.  The court will schedule the review hearing and send notice to the defendant at the most recent address provided to the Clerk of Court's office.

Defendant shall complete the COMPAS within 60 days of filing of the Diversion Agreement with the Court.

Defendant to comply with all other terms and conditions of this Agreement.
Defendant shall pay restitution in the amount of $39.04 and restitution surcharge of $3.90 for a total of $42.94 within 9 months of the acceptance of the agreement by the Court.

timeConds.notes:
Defendant shall complete 30 hours of community service within 9 months of the acceptance of the agreement by the Court.
Concurrent with: Concurrent with 15CM170

miscConds.notes: Restitution of $39.04 and restitution surcharge of $3.90 previously paid in full.
Obtain and maintain employment in a profession suitable to agent.

No controlled substances without a valid prescription in defendant's own name.

No drug paraphernalia.

Complete AODA assessment and comply with any treatment recommendations.

Comply with any no contacts, conditions and assessments per agent.

Obtain housing acceptable to agent.

Pay supervision fees as determined by the Department of Corrections.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea
